thing-type.label: Internet Radio
thing-type.description: An internet radio device based on the Frontier Silicon chipset.

parameter.name: ip
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: The IP address (name or numeric) of the internet radio.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port of the internet radio (default: 80).

parameter.name: pin
parameter.label: Pin
parameter.description: The PIN configured in the internet radio (default: 1234).

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in seconds.

channel-type.label: Power
channel-type.description: Switch the radio on or off.

channel-type.label: Preset
channel-type.description: Preset radio stations configured in the radio.

channel-type.label: Current Title
channel-type.description: The name of the current radio station or track.

channel-type.label: Info Text
channel-type.description: Additional information e.g. of the current radio station.

channel-type.label: Mode
channel-type.description: The radio mode, e.g. FM radio, internet radio, AUX, etc.
